channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Authorities investigate death of airman based in New Mexico
item.description: Authorities are investigating the death of a 28-year-old airman who was based at Cannon Air Force Base in New Mexico. The U.S. Department of Defense says Staff Sgt.

item.title: Elephant calf born at a California zoo _ with another on the way
item.description: An elephant calf has been born at a California zoo that has embarked on an elephant breeding program.

item.title: Perdue recalls 167,000 pounds of chicken nuggets after consumers find metal wire in some packages
item.description: Check your freezer. Perdue Foods is recalling more than 167,000 pounds of frozen chicken nuggets and tenders after some customers reported finding metal wire embedded in the products.
